name: Wheat&Purple Striped Scarf
description:
This wonderful striped scarf is 6" wide,66" with out fringe, and 70" long with fringe.

Perfect for any outfit.
(NOTE: The color of this item reflects the color in the close up picture of the scarf.)

*All items are handmade.Sometimes due to lighting and other reasons the picture does not reflect the exact color or length of the product. If you have any questions about any item, feel free to contact me at anytime.
